Summary: saw it in northern sky glowing orange, for 4 minutes changed direction like u-turn
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ozark
There were no other sightings in Ozark on or around September 12th 2012
divs: sighting detailsstepped out on my back deck at 9:00pm and instantly saw a bright white\orange glowing light to the north,moving slowly from east to west about 20 degrees from horizon over neighbors houses. it continued west for a minute or so then gradually started heading north and started increasing it's speed. within 30 seconds it was pretty much out of sight.
